sentence.Network_en: I cannot believe that Smangus villers would purposely act unethically and illegally.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不相信司马库斯族人会蓄意做出违反伦理及法律的举动.

sentence.Network_en: Multinational companies are unethically exploiting the plant genetic resources of developing countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些跨国公司在不顾道义地开采发展中国家的植物遗传资源.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Xing and Ms. Gu's values were distorted and led them to act unethically.
sentence.Network_cn: 邢先生与顾女士的价值观扭曲,导致了他们的不道德行为.

list.abs: such unethical engagements not only violate human rights of Chinese people , but also jeopardize their term business interests in China .这类不道德的行为不仅侵犯了中国人的人权，而且危害了他们在中国的长期商业利益。
采购管理培训课程-公开课-广东培训网 ... 不合乎道德的举动 Unethical Behaviour 专业采购操守 Professional Purchasing Ethics.
he has embezzled state-owned assets through various unethical ways .他以各种不正当手段猎食国有资产。
